name: Inertia (itch)
description:
I feel so helpless and free . . .

Stranded in the asteroid belt of an alien planet, you must leap carefully among the rocks to collect and reassemble your shattered spacecraft.

. . . can't fight this sinking feeling inside of me

Features

  • 20 hand-crafted levels
  • awesome, original soundtrack
  • an easy-to-use level editor (send in levels and they may be added to a future version of Inertia, and you'll get credit)

Pay $1 and get access to

  • the game's soundtrack, including a funny bonus track and a higher-quality version of the one featured in game
  • an Inertia-themed desktop background
  • all source code and assets

Inertia's development has gone 7 times 'round the sun, starting on a 6th grader's pad of graph paper, and, in its most recent turn, available here, digitized and with awesome graphics and music. And you can play the original levels from 7 years past!
